Html:
Hello.

According to description of this Library, it has Delaunay triangulations. However, most of examples and questions about this lib is drawing 3d meshes and diagrams. I need only result of calculation.

I have three points with their own X and Y coordinates and I need to calculate coordinates of fourth point. I have three distances which tells me how far fourth point is located from each of them.

Is it possible to pass coordinates and distances and retrieve new point by using this library?

Where does this problem come from? It sounds like a middle school homework and I'm afraid Triangle.NET won't help you here.

Geometrically, you are searching for a common intersection of 3 circles, which, in general, you can't expect to exist.
